document_data.name: Seven Songs Importing
document_data.mainbody: '''Seven Songs Importing''' was a shop in [[Athkatla]]'s rich [[Athkatla/Temple District|Temple District]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Seven Songs Importing stood across from the famed [[Crown Aflame]] theater of Athkatla on the crossing of the [[Street of Seven Altars]], [[Oblade Street]], and [[Aundle's Walk]]. The shop's next-door neighbor to the west was the home of [[Marimmal Theer]], an actor and musician of the late 14{{th}} century DR.
document_data.Activities: The shop dealt in little physical goods, instead, it procured a variety of rare and exotic goods to order.
